channel.title: Requrment's For items

item.title: Requrment's For items
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Your if doesn’t have an else, so the server doesn’t know what to do if the criteria is met.
Example:

if (wearID == 18355 && c.playerLevel[24] != 99) { c.sendMessage("blah"); canWearItem = false; } else { canWearItem = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Requrment's For items
item.dc:creator: @ther3aper ther3aper
item.description:
@ther3aper wrote:

Hello, I am trying to make it so “Chaotic’s” You must have a summoning level of 99 to use it. Here is my code i put in itemassistnt.java. It works but when i try to put on the item it says you must have 99 summoning to wield it but i do have 99 summoning and it doesn’t work.

if(wearID == 12169 ||wearID == 12170 ||wearID == 12524 ||wearID == 12524||wearID == 18359 || wearID == 18357|| wearID == 12169|| wearID == 12170 || wearID == 18355 || wearID == 18353 || wearID == 18351 || wearID == 18349 && c.playerLevel[24] != 99) { c.sendMessage("You need 99 summoning level to wield this weapon"); canWearItem = false; return false;
}

Read full topic
